page.title: 04DALCROSS INDUSTRIAL ESTATE.
page.content: Tucked away beside the Dalcross airport is an Industrial Estate. The most important employer on the estate is Nontox,who transport chemicals and destroy them.The most worries about chemicals nowadays is that some people dump them in the sea and cause pollution.One of the other buildings is Salvesons;they freeze foods and fruit for shops.Later in the year when the raspberries are picked the tractors take most of them to Salvesons to store for the major shops.One other building in the Industrial Estate is Hambleside which manufactures asbestos roofing sheets.There is a small Electricity Sub-station for the Dalcross Industrial Estate.In the Salvesons' grounds is a big water tank.
